import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { getAllProduct } from '../API/ApiProduct' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function ViewProduct() { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]) const loadProducts = async () => { const result = await getAllProduct() setProducts(result) } useEffect(() => { loadProducts() }, []) return (
